headline: Could Buying Tesla Stock Today Be the Smartest Decision You Make This Year?
summary: Tesla stock has trailed the market for a few years now.  Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) is one of the best-performing stocks of the last 10 years, up close to 2,000% for shareholders and crushing the broad market averages.  Down around 14% this year, investors are beginning to doubt Elon Musk and Tesla stock again.

headline: Could Buying Tesla Stock Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: Tesla’s strongest bulls believe the company's financials will get a massive boost as it makes progress with robotaxis and humanoid robots.  The stock’s expensive valuation highlights how much optimism the market has for what is an uncertain future.  With its shares soaring almost 21,000% since their initial public offering 15 years ago (as of June 11), Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) has done just that.

headline: Trump's Bill Would End EV Subsidies: Could This Kill Tesla?
summary: Tesla's capital advantage keeps the business safe for now.  Billionaire Elon Musk is fighting to make sure federal tax incentives for electric vehicles (EVs) -- a key subsidy that makes buying EVs more affordable -- remain in place.  President Donald Trump's new bill seeks to eliminate these tax incentives, which would otherwise be in place until 2032.

summary: Federal tax credits for electric vehicles could soon be eliminated.  Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) has long been a volatile stock, but it's also become a very controversial name in recent months.  If you're monitoring Tesla stock, here are two numbers you need to be tracking.

headline: Better EV Stock: BYD vs. Tesla
summary: Tesla and BYD are two of the largest players in the electric vehicle space.  BYD has outperformed Tesla in China lately.  Electric vehicle (EV) companies like Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) and BYD (OTC: BYDDY) have captivated the minds of investors everywhere, as many view EVs as a viable new transportation option in a world that badly needs to reduce carbon emissions.

headline: Baird Lowers Tesla (TSLA) to Hold, Citing Valuation and Robotaxi Risk
summary: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) is one of the 10 best tech stocks to buy according to billionaires right now. On June 9, Ben Kallo of Robert W. Baird downgraded Tesla from Buy to Hold mainly on valuation concerns, while keeping his price target unchanged at $320. In his view, much of the recent upside in the stock, up […]

headline: Rare earth supply risks: Is Tesla the real target by China?
summary: Investing.com -- With China granting rare earth export licenses to GM, Ford, and Stellantis (NYSE:STLA) but not to Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA), questions are mounting over whether Tesla is being deliberately targeted amid ongoing trade tensions and Musk’s outspoken foreign policy stance.

headline: What To Expect in Markets This Week: Fed Rate Decision, Juneteenth Holiday, US Retail Sales, Tesla Robotaxi Rollout
summary: The Federal Reserve's interest rate decision, consumer spending data, and possible news on President Donald Trump's tariffs headline the week.  The Fed will hand down another decision on interest rates this week, with a decision scheduled for Wednesday.  The coming weekend could see Tesla providing a significant update on the direction of the electric vehicle maker.

headline: Warren Buffett Says Buy This Index Fund. It Could Turn $400 Per Month Into $851,800 With Help From Apple, Nvidia, and Tesla.
summary: Warren Buffett has consistently recommended an S&P 500 index fund as the best form of stock market exposure for most investors.  The S&P 500 returned 1,860% over the last three decades, or 10.4% annually, a pace that would turn $400 per month into $851,800.  Warren Buffett has earned a reputation as one of Wall Street's greatest investors.
